review: The colander is nothing speical, but the slicer and the pit remover are great ideas! Got this for my mom on mother's day. She now has a set at both houses. The whole set is a very cool tool to help stream line your strawberry eating experience. So what more can I say... Buy!
productTitle: Joie 3-Piece Strawberry Colander, Huller and Slicer Set
